name: Sacrifice (itch) (Reborn_FLD)
description:
COMMANDS :

- WASD / ZQSD to move
- Left and Right clic to fire
- E to merge the 2 elements in your hand

You, as an elemental humanoid, must kill the oppressive gigantic earth golem to protect the DeathWorld.

Our Hero can control 3 different elements : Fire / Ice / Electricity.
Each hand can stand 1 element, which makes combo possible.
To take an element in your left : hit 1, 2 or 3 on your keyboard to select it from your spell bar then left click to put it in left hand.
To take an element in your right hand : hit 1, 2 or 3 on your keyboard to select it from your spell bar then right click to put it in right hand.
When you got an element in each hand, you can merge it to make a combo spell.

COMBOS:
Fire + Fire = Attak Speed buff.
Ice + Ice = Icebloc to protect yourself.
Electricity + Electricity = Transfer.
Fire + Ice = FlameThrower.
Fire + Electricity = Fire Tornado
Ice + Electricity = Antimatter Missile.

But, in order to defeat the monster, you'll need to regain mana from the DeathWorld.
Indeed, the golem is surely going to kill you, or you will come out of mana, so as a ghost you'll be able to harvest mana orbs from the DeathWorld.
Regaining your mana is a tought journey, because you'll have less and less time depending on your death count.
The spirits will let you in the other world only 30 seconds at first, and decrease the time left by 5 seconds at every deaths.
If you collect up to 10 orbs ( 100 mana ), you will come back to life to continue your fight.
If you don't collect enought mana in the remaining time, the spirits will keep you in the death world forever.

Thank you in advance for testing our game,

Reborn TEAM.
